summary: This header file declares the AITime class, which represents AI runtime time and conscious time. It also includes methods for setting up a time trigger with optional canTrigger condition and trigger action. The time trigger is currently used to activate reflection-type comparisons.

details.comment: This header file declares the AITime class, which represents AI runtime time and conscious time. It also includes methods for setting up a time trigger with optional canTrigger condition and trigger action. The time trigger is currently used to activate reflection-type comparisons.
